name: Battleaxe
description: Proficiency with a battleaxe allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.

name: Blowgun
description: Proficiency with a blowgun allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.

name: Boomerang
description: Ranged weapon, any creature proficient with the javelin is also proficient with this weapon. On a miss, a boomerang returns to the thrower's hand.

name: Chain Sickle
description: This weapon is a sickle attached to a heavy iron weight by a length of chain. In some cultures it is known as a kusarigama.  You can use a chain sickle to make an Entangle action, if your DM allows you to use that optional rule.

name: Club
description: Proficiency with a club allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.

name: Dagger
description: Proficiency with a dagger allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.

name: Dart
description: Proficiency with a dart allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.

name: Double-Bladed Scimitar
description: The signature weapon of Valenar elves. These blades are strong, sharp, and remarkably light. A Valenar blade in the hands of a non-elf is generally assumed to have been stolen or looted from a fallen foe, and a Valenar elf might feel entitled to demand its return or challenge the bearer to prove they're worthy to wield it. **Special:** If you attack with a double-bladed scimitar as part of the Attack action on your turn, you can use a bonus action immediately after to make a melee attack with it. This attack deals 1d4 slashing damage on a hit, instead of 2d4.

description: Proficiency with a flail allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.

description: Proficiency with a glaive allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.

name: Lance
description: Proficiency with a lance allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it. You have disadvantage when you use a lance to attack a target within 5 feet of you. Also, a lance requires two hands to wield when you aren't mounted.

name: Longbow
description: Proficiency with a longbow allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.

name: Morningstar
description: Proficiency with a morningstar allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.

name: Net
description: Proficiency with a net allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it. A Large or smaller creature hit by a net is restrained until it is freed. A net has no effect on creatures that are formless, or creatures that are Huge or larger. A creature can use its action to make a DC 10 Strength check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) also frees the creature without harming it, ending the effect and destroying the net. When you use an action, bonus action, or reaction to attack with a net, you can make only one attack regardless of the number of attacks you can normally make.
